item.title: Socket编程client和server实例
item.description: Socket编程client和server实例 来源：《Computer Network A Top Down Approach》 UDPClient.py # UDPClient.py from socket import * serverName = '127.0.0.1' serverPort = 12000 clientSocket = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM) message = input('Input lowercase sentence:') clientSocket.sendto(message.encode(), (serverName, serverPort)) # Receive modifiedMessage, serverAddress = clientSocket.recvfrom(2048) print(modifiedMessage.decode()) clientSocket.close() UDPServer.py # UDPServer.py from socket import * serverPort = 12000 serverSocket = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM) serverSocket.bind(('', serverPort)) print("The server is ready to receive ...") while True: message, clientAddress = serverSocket.
